title: Didn't receive a time penalty and now game crashes
body: Hey guys due to daily life events I was logged out of a game and said I was afk and I would have gladly accepted it since I was at fault however logging on the next day to play my game and expecting to wait an extra 5 or so minutes. However there was no penalty so I proceeded to start a draft game we go though champ select and locking and and as the game was about to go into the loading screen I say to me that your game has crashed and I tried to reconnect but it wouldn't let me, so the game ending and I expected to receive an even longer penalty but I still decided to play with my friend but yet again I received no penalty and yet again thinking nothing of it I started another draft game with my friend and the same thing happened I've checked my internet and everything I've reset my computer and reinstalled league but nothing is working is love some help if possible

replies.body:
Given that you are consistently experiencing these issues after Champion Selection, it seems like your computer is either not able to connect to the Game Server, or your computer is able to load League of Legends normally.

To get a better idea of the root cause, when you say you get an crash error message, what does it say exactly?  Is it possible to get a screenshot of the error from a Custom Game?  Depending on which error message you get, the troubleshooting steps may be completely different!

Feel free to reply back and let me know!
